name: Peachtree Capital Advisors, Inc.
overview:
Peachtree Capital Advisors provides investment banking services to growth and middle market companies in the technology, digital media, and greentech sectors. Peachtree has completed over 20 transactions with a focus on maximizing value at each stage of the process. The group has substantial insight in its core sectors and fifteen years of industry focus.

Peachtree was established to serve the merger and acquisition advisory needs in technology, digital media, and greentech, and is able to deliver expert advice in valuing assets, positioning companies during the sale process, developing information memoranda to send to potential buyers, coaching management through presentations, developing bids/deal structure analysis, and managing the due diligence process to close.
